fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Buy someone's ability.
- Peek into someone's channel.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Buying someone's ability steals their ability and gives it to you.
- They can't say no because you're rich, apparently.
- You have 3 lives and 3 votes because you're 3 people. If you die, you lose a life and a vote. If you lose all lives, you die, because only living people have lives.
- Peeking into someone's channel lets you see their channel that night.
